head.title: Raff Simms
head.name: Raff Simms
head.description: An award-winning undergraduate studying towards a Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Computer Systems (Cyber Security).

elements.title: Upload Server
elements.subtext: A web application created using Node.JS that accepts file upload requests and returns a shareable link pointing to the uploaded file.

elements.title: Bind Keylogger
elements.subtext: A remote keylogger application created with Python — capable of handling multiple client connections simultaneously.

elements.title: Social Scanner
elements.subtext: A web application created using Next.JS that checks the availability of usernames on a variety of online platforms.

elements.title: Dynamic WebM
elements.subtext: A simple command line tool written in Python allowing you to create WebM videos that change resolution when played.

elements.title: Bachelor of Science (Hons) — Computer Systems (Cyber Security)
elements.subtext: I am currently studying towards a Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Computer Systems (Cyber Security) with supplementary Chinese (Mandarin) at Nottingham Trent University — predicted to achieve a First. I am due to complete a year-long industry placement with Mercedes AMG High Performance Powertrains before graduating in 2025.

elements.title: Level 3 National Extended Diploma — Computing and Cyber Security
elements.subtext: I completed a Level 3 National Extended Diploma in Computing and Cyber Security at Derby College — achieving an overall grade of D*D*D. The course covered a wide range of computing topics, including programming, system analysis & design, mathematics, information/cybersecurity, and IT project management.

elements.title: Ryland Consulting Award for Exceptional Performance
elements.subtext: I was awarded by Ryland Consulting and the NTU School of Science and Technology for Best Progress within Year One of BSc (Hons) Computer Systems (Cyber Security).
